channel.title: Need help with more advanced conversation stoofs :P
channel.description:
Yeah, i've made a conversation with an npc and all...and now, I just want to know how to add in these things:
*How do you make it when a person has a certain item (And a certain amount of that item :P) it opens up a DIFFERENT conversation with them, or just make it a message to them if they DONT have the item. [s]*How do you make the NPC teleport you DURING a conversation? [/s] *How do you make an NPC GIVE you an item?
Thanks :)

item.title: Need help with more advanced conversation stoofs :P
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

Tried, nothing happens. No errors, but it doesnt work ingame. Doesnt open up the diff conversation when I have the item I put in.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with more advanced conversation stoofs :P

item.title: Need help with more advanced conversation stoofs :P
item.dc:creator: @mrx229 mrx229
item.description:
@mrx229 wrote:

umm just do something like this…i think
but replace 0s with the right numbers

if (playerHasItemAmount(0000, 1) || playerHasItem(0000) || playerHasItem(0000) || playerHasItem(0000)) {
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 00;
} else {
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 00;

Read full topic
